analyzed: des 'di snyam du gal te gcan gzan dag gis bdag zos na 'di ltar sbyin pa de byin par gyur cig / bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
translated: He should think, ‘If carnivorous animals were to eat me, may I give that gift, may I complete the perfection of generosity,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and may I come very close to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
translated: Just as, when I fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can yong ye med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can yong ye med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do //
translated: in that buddhafield, any being in the animal realm will not exist at all, I should generate that kind of thought.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu rkun po'i dgon par song na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu rkun po'i dgon par song na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dang bar mi bya'o //
translated: “Śāriputra, when a bodhisattva mahāsattva has gone to a forest of thieves, he should not be afraid, should not be terrified, should not be overcome with terror.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mkhas pa yin te /
translated: Because those bodhisattva mahāsattvas are skilled in giving away all possessions.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus kyang yongs su btang ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus kyang yongs su btang ba yin /
translated: Bodhisattva mahāsattvas have given away their bodies.

original: yo byad dang 'tshog chas kyang yongs su btang ba yin /🔽des 'di snyam du gal te sems can de dag gis bdag gi yo byad dang 'tshog chas rnams phrogs na de dag la sbyin pa de byin par gyur cig / gal te de dag gis bdag gi srog bcad par gyur kyang de la bdag gis zhe sdang dang
analyzed: yo byad dang 'tshog chas kyang yongs su btang ba yin / des 'di snyam du gal te sems can de dag gis bdag gi yo byad dang 'tshog chas rnams phrogs na de dag la sbyin pa de byin par gyur cig / gal te de dag gis bdag gi srog bcad par gyur kyang de la bdag gis zhe sdang dang
translated: They have given away their possessions and belongings.🔽They should think, ‘If those beings take my possessions and belongings, I will have given them a gift.🔽If they take my life, I will not arouse anger

original: khong khro bskyed bar mi bya /
analyzed: khong khro bskyed bar mi bya /
translated: or hostility toward them.’

original: bdag gis de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang nyes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang nyes par mi bya'o //
translated: I will not do them any harm with my body, speech, or mind.

original: de ltar na de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @188b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de ltar na de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @188b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: In this way, at that time, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of patient acceptance will be fulfilled.

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu nye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu nye bar 'gyur te /
translated: I will be very close to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
translated: Just as, when I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa 'di dang bzhan  gzhan yang yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa 'di dang bzhan  gzhan yang yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
translated: in that buddhafield, these and other faults will not exist at all,

original: de ltar bsgrub po snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub po snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: I will do it in that way. I will practice in that way.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu chu'i dgon par phyin na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu chu'i dgon par phyin na /
translated: “Śāriputra, if you go to a desert with no water,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dang bar mi bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas should not be afraid, should not be terrified, should not be overcome with terror.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i chos can yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i chos can yin te /
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas have the quality of fearlessness.

original: des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sred pa thams cad gcod par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sred pa thams cad gcod par bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should think like this: 'I should train in cutting off all the craving of all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skrag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skrag par mi bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas should not be afraid.

original: gal te bdag skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te bdag skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: If I were to die of thirst, I would arouse the thought of great compassion for all sentient beings.

original: kye ma 'di ltar 'jig rten na chu'i dgon pa 'di lta bu snang bas sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams chung ba dag ste /
analyzed: kye ma 'di ltar 'jig rten na chu'i dgon pa 'di lta bu snang bas sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams chung ba dag ste /
translated: Alas, in this way, since a waterless wilderness appears in the world, these sentient beings have little merit.

original: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /
translated: Just as I, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na chu'i dgon pa yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o de ltar bsgrub po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na chu'i dgon pa yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o de ltar bsgrub po //
translated: I will act and I will accomplish it so that in that buddha-field, the desert of water will never exist in any way, will not appear.

original: ji ltar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu rnyed par 'gyur ba de ltar bsod nams kyi las la sems can rnams sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu rnyed par 'gyur ba de ltar bsod nams kyi las la sems can rnams sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will apply beings to meritorious actions so that they will find water endowed with the eight qualities.

original: ji ltar de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: I will arouse the thought, ‘I will undertake firm effort for the sake of all beings so that at that time the perfection of effort will be fulfilled.’

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang bkres pa'i dgon par song na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang bkres pa'i dgon par song na /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when one has entered the desert of hunger,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o //
translated: a bodhisattva mahāsattva should not be afraid, should not be terrified, should not be overcome by fear.

original: des 'di ltar 'dis go cha bgo ste /
analyzed: des 'di ltar 'dis go cha bgo ste /
translated: He should don the armor in this way:

original: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bkres pa'i dgon @189a * //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bkres pa'i dgon @189a * //
translated: “When I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: pa 'di lta bu yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur zhing bde ba la dbang ba dang / bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: pa 'di lta bu yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur zhing bde ba la dbang ba dang / bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya ste /
translated: in this buddhafield, this kind of desert of hunger will never occur, will not be seen, and all those sentient beings will be happy, will be endowed with happiness, and will be in control of happiness.

original: de ltar rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: I will undertake this kind of firm and diligent effort, and in this way I will thoroughly refine my own buddhafield.

original: ji ltar na sems can de dag gang ci sems par 'gyur ba dang yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ji ltar na sems can de dag gang ci sems par 'gyur ba dang yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung bar 'gyur ba /
translated: How can it be that whatever those sentient beings think and whatever they wish for in their minds will come to pass?

original: 'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yid la bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / yid la bsam pa thams cad 'byung ba bzhin du de ltar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yid la bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / yid la bsam pa thams cad 'byung ba bzhin du de ltar bya'o //
translated: For example, just as all the wishes of the gods of the Thirty-Three are fulfilled and all their wishes are accomplished, so it is for them.

original: ji ltar sems can de dag chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad du thams cad las 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sems can de dag chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad du thams cad las 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya'o //
translated: I will generate the thought: “I will undertake firm effort so that those sentient beings will fulfill their virtuous intentions and so that no sentient being will ever be deprived of the necessities of life.”

original: de ltar dus rnams rtag tu sems can gyi don bya ba 'di ni bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de ltar dus rnams rtag tu sems can gyi don bya ba 'di ni bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu ste /
translated: Thus, always working for the welfare of sentient beings is a cause for increasing goodness.

original: zhib tu ni spyod yul yongs su dag ba'i mdo las blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhib tu ni spyod yul yongs su dag ba'i mdo las blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is explained in detail in the Sūtra on Thoroughly Pure Conduct.

original: gzhan yang / chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med //
analyzed: gzhan yang / chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med //
translated: Moreover, the generosity of Dharma, free of material things,

original: bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur te //
analyzed: bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur te //
translated: is a cause for increasing goodness.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
translated: This is as described in the Sutra Encouraging Nobler Intention:

original: byams pa gang zhig thob ba dang bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin pa byin na /
analyzed: byams pa gang zhig thob ba dang bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin pa byin na /
translated: Maitreya, if one gives the gift of Dharma without desiring gain or honor,

original: chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med pa'i phan yon nyi shu ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med pa'i phan yon nyi shu ste /
translated: there are twenty benefits of the gift of Dharma that is free of material desires.

original: nyi shu gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyi shu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the twenty?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: dran pa dang ldan pa yin /🔽blo dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pa yin / blo dang ldan pa yin /
translated: One is endowed with mindfulness.🔽One is endowed with intelligence.

original: blo gros dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: blo gros dang ldan pa yin /
translated: One is endowed with wisdom.

original: mos pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: mos pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: One is endowed with interest.

original: shes rab dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan pa yin /
translated: One is endowed with insight.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtogs par 'gyur pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtogs par 'gyur pa yin /
translated: One realizes supramundane insight.

original: 'dod chags chung ba yin /🔽zhe sdang chung ba yin /
analyzed: 'dod chags chung ba yin / zhe sdang chung ba yin /
translated: One has little desire.🔽One has little anger.

original: gti mug chung ba yin /
analyzed: gti mug chung ba yin /
translated: One has little ignorance.

original: bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin /
analyzed: bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin /
translated: Mara cannot find an opportunity to harm one.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin /
translated: One is considered by the Bhagavan Buddhas.

original: mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de srung ba yin /
analyzed: mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de srung ba yin /
translated: Non-humans protect one.

original: lha rnams de'i lus la mdangs 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: lha rnams de'i lus la mdangs 'jug pa yin /
translated: The gods infuse one’s body with radiance.

original: mi mdza' ba rnams kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin /
analyzed: mi mdza' ba rnams kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin /
translated: Enemies will not find an opportunity to harm them.

original: de mdza' bo rnams dang mi phyed pa yin /
analyzed: de mdza' bo rnams dang mi phyed pa yin /
translated: They will be inseparable from their friends.

original: tshig @189b gsung bar 'os pa yin /
analyzed: tshig @189b gsung bar 'os pa yin /
translated: They will be worthy of being spoken to.

original: mi 'jigs pa thob pa yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa thob pa yin /
translated: They will attain fearlessness.

original: yid bde ba mang ba yin /
analyzed: yid bde ba mang ba yin /
translated: They will have much mental happiness.

original: mkhas pas bsngags pa yin /
analyzed: mkhas pas bsngags pa yin /
translated: They will be praised by the wise.

original: de chos kyi sbyin pa de rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de chos kyi sbyin pa de rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: They will remember that gift of Dharma.

original: byams pa phan yon nyi shu po de dag go zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: byams pa phan yon nyi shu po de dag go zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Maitreya, those are the twenty benefits.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang gsungs te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang gsungs te /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom says,

original: gal te kun dga' bo khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bstan la /
analyzed: gal te kun dga' bo khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bstan la /
translated: “If, Ānanda, you were to teach the Dharma of the śrāvaka levels to the persons in the Śrāvaka Vehicle,

original: chos bstan pa des kyang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur kyang /
analyzed: chos bstan pa des kyang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur kyang /
translated: and if, through that teaching of the Dharma, all the sentient beings in the three-billion-fold world-realm were to manifest the state of an arhat,

original: da dung nyan thos khyod kyis nga la nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur ro //🔽kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la /
analyzed: da dung nyan thos khyod kyis nga la nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur ro // kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la /
translated: Moreover, you, Śrāvaka, would not be acting as a śrāvaka toward me.🔽Ānanda, if you were to teach a single word endowed with the perfection of wisdom to a bodhisattva great being,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig cig bstan nam bshad na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig cig bstan nam bshad na /
translated: if you were to explain it,

original: de ltar na nyan thos kyis nga mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na nyan thos kyis nga mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: then in that way you would please me, the śrāvaka.

original: chos bstan pa snga mas gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur la /
analyzed: chos bstan pa snga mas gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur la /
translated: Ānanda, suppose that by the previous teaching of the Dharma all those sentient beings in the great billionfold world system were to attain arhatship,

original: dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de la kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de la kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems /
translated: and suppose that the wholesome actions that consist in giving and the wholesome actions that consist in moral discipline and the wholesome actions that consist in meditation of those arhats were to be taken as one, what do you think, Ānanda?

original: bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba yin nam /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba yin nam /
translated: Is it a great heap of merit?”

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das mang lags so //
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das mang lags so //
translated: He replied, “Blessed One, it is great.

original: bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so //
translated: Well-Gone One, it is great.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na /
translated: “Ānanda, someone who teaches the perfection of wisdom to bodhisattva great beings in this way

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed de //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed de //
translated: generates a much greater heap of merit than a person in the vehicle of the hearers.
